titleStmt.title: Salmacis, Lyrian & Sylvia, forsaken Lydia, the rape of Helen, a comment thereon, with severall other poems and translations. By Edvvard Sherburne Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Preti, Girolamo, 1582-1626.
Marino, Giambattista, 1569-1625.
Colluthus, of Lycopolis.
Saint-Amant, Marc Antoine Gérard, sieur de, 1594-1661.
Sherburne, Edward, Sir, 1618-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Hunt, for Thomas Dring, at the sign of the George, near Cliffords-Inn in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: "The rape of Hellen, out of the Greek of Coluthus" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffeb. 11th 1650"; imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Salmace / Girolamo Preti -- Lidia abbandonata / Giambattista Marino -- Metamorphose de Lyrian et de Sylvie / Marc Antoine Gérard, sieur de Saint-Amant.

place.placeName: the sign of the George, near Cliffords-Inn in Fleetstreet
